topics.body:
Everyone knows this game called Charlie Charlie, right?

My mother and I started discussing that is fake or not, that how a simple paper with a pair of pens can summon demons is dumb and very absurd, and that is a very dangerous game.

Well, she _really_ believes those things. She believed that because a stupid paranormal program showed videos of people playing the game getting possessed or shit like that. One of those videos was about a group of girls "getting possessed by demons" after playing Charlie Charlie in middle of a class, with all the other students and teachers praying.

Well guess what?

THAT FUCKING VIDEO THAT WAS SHOWED IN THAT PROGRAM LIKE IT WAS A REAL PROVE THAT THE GAME WAS DANGEROUS _IS REALLY A PROMO OF MOVIE!_

^I wrote this post while watching an movie scene of a group of dudes raping a a woman and a man^

-Shady

evening ruined
!http://i.imgur.com/adBnksF.jpg!
